SELECT [Sku] ,[Banner] ,[Banner] ,[9_2008] ,[9_2009] ,'9_result'= case when charindex('N',[9_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[9_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[9_result]+'%</font>' else [9_result]+'%' end end ,[10_2008] ,[10_2009] ,'10_result'= case when charindex('N',[10_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[10_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[10_result]+'%</font>' else [10_result]+'%' end end ,[11_2008] ,[11_2009] ,'11_result'= case when charindex('N',[11_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[11_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[11_result]+'%</font>' else [11_result]+'%' end end ,[12_2008] ,[12_2009] ,'12_result'= case when charindex('N',[12_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[12_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[12_result]+'%</font>' else [12_result]+'%' end end ,[1_2008] ,[1_2009] ,'1_result'= case when charindex('N',[1_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[1_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[1_result]+'%</font>' else [1_result]+'%' end end ,[2_2008] ,[2_2009] ,'2_result'= case when charindex('N',[2_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[2_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[2_result]+'%</font>' else [2_result]+'%' end end ,[3_2008] ,[3_2009] ,'3_result'= case when charindex('N',[3_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[3_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[3_result]+'%</font>' else [3_result]+'%' end end ,[4_2008] ,[4_2009] ,'4_result'= case when charindex('N',[4_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[4_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[4_result]+'%</font>' else [4_result]+'%' end end ,[5_2008] ,[5_2009] ,'5_result'= case when charindex('N',[5_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[5_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[5_result]+'%</font>' else [5_result]+'%' end end
,[YTD_2008] ,[YTD_2009] ,'YTD_result'= case when charindex('N',[YTD_result])=1 then '<font color=green>NEW</font>' else case when charindex('-',[YTD_result])=1 then '<font color=red>' +[YTD_result]+'%</font>' else [YTD_result]+'%' end end ,Share+'%' FROM TMP_BY_BANNER
